short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension for integrating ear training practice into your web browsing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
ðŸŽ¼ Harmon-EZ lets you train your ears while browsing the web!  It embeds into the websites you enjoy, bringing the training to you.  Browse Reddit, Youtube, Twitter, Twitch, and Google, with small doses of training at your own pace, woven into recreational internet usage.
